metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4285 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: An illegal memory access flaw was found in the binutils package. Parsing an ELF file containing corrupt symbol version information may result in a denial of service. This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-16599.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs. rodrigo-zaiden> versions earlier than 2.35 are not affected.

criterions.comment: binutils-avr package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
gdb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
